lokayen jaya ganima 20 oba kristhun wahanse samanga mari, lokaye bhuthadhipathingen jaya gaththahu nam thawa ma lokayata ayithi wuwan men jiwath wemin, 21 ‘mewata atha nogasanu’, ‘mewa anubhawa nokaranu’, ‘mewa sparsha nokaranu’ yana niyoga walata yatath wanne man da? 22 manushyaya panawu me niyoga, bhawitha kala pasu kunu wi yana de pilibanda wa ya. 23 thaman ma mawagath namaskara krama nisath, wyaja nihathamanikama nisath, sharirayata wada dima nisath, balu balmata ee niyogawala watinakamak athi se penunath mansika thrushna mandalimata eewayin kisi rukulak nolabe.

janapathige kaduwata uuwa maha amathi kapeyi; eheth maha bankuwa kolla ka ranil, rawi thawamath nidalle
janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathithuma ada (15) mahanuwara shri dalada maligawata pamina dalada samindun wandapuda gena aashirwada labagath bawa janadhipathi madhya anshaya pawasayi.

hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pawule methek athadanguwata nogath prabalayaku idiri sathi kihipaya thula athadanguwata ganenu athayi ihala pele aarakshaka ansha aaranchi marga wartha kara atha .ohuta erehiwa dirgha kalayak thisse kala parikshana dan hamara wemin pawathi.
daraniyagala polis bala pradeshaye boralankada gramaye damila pasale onchilla kanuwaka elli 38 wiyathi ekdaru piyeku siya diwinasagena atha.
